alert.note: Alert for Sauk (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 30 at 6:13PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Sauk County through 700 PM CDT... At 613 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Spring Green, or 15 miles east of Richland Center, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Reedsburg, Wisconsin Dells, Lake Delton, Spring Green, Plain, La Valle, Rock Springs, Loganville, Ironton, Lime Ridge and Hill Point. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for south central Wisconsin.
